1997.description: PT. Altama Surya Arsa was established, focusing on the sales of tools and lubricants.

1998.description: PT. Altama Surya Arsa launched the TEKIRO brand, specializing in hand tools.

2001.description: PT. Altama Surya Arsa expanded its business segments by entering the Modern Market and Automotive Market.

2006.description: PT. Altama Surya Arsa introduced the RYU brand, operating in the power tools sector.

2011.description: PT. Altama Surya Arsa officially changed its name to PT. Altama Surya Anugerah.

2013.description: PT. Altama Surya Anugerah launched the REXCO brand, focusing on lubricants.

2018.description: PT. Altama Surya Anugerah established its first warehouse in Muara Baru, Penjaringan, North Jakarta.

2019.description: PT. Altama Surya Anugerah moved into its headquarters, Altama Building, located in Bandengan, North Jakarta.

2021.description: PT. Altama Surya Anugerah built its second warehouse in the Moden Cikande Industrial Area, Serang Regency, Banten.

hero.title: Awards &
hero.subtitle: A proven reflection of trust, quality and Altama's achievement

awardRecognition.title: Award Recognition
awardRecognition.description: Altama has received numerous prestigious national awards, such as Indonesia Brand Champion, Brand Choice Award, CNN Awards, Top Digital PR Platinum, Golden Brand, Best Brand Award, Otomotif Choice Award, Superbrands, and Top Brand. These accolades represent official recognition of the consistent performance and brand credibility of Tekiro, Rexco, and RYU. These achievements further strengthen Altama’s position as a trusted national distributor and reflect our commitment to quality, reliability, and long-term partnerships across Indonesia.

internationalStandard.title: International Standard:
internationalStandard.description: Altama officially received the ISO 9001:2015 certification in April 2022 as a testament to our commitment to implementing internationally recognized quality standards. ISO 9001:2015, or Quality Management System (QMS), is a global standard that ensures organizations consistently deliver products and services that meet customer requirements while continuously improving operational efficiency and performance.This certification reinforces Altama’s dedication to quality, process excellence, and customer satisfaction across all business operations
